Name: Rosemary Tuck
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (discarded) & rosemary sprig.
Review: A refreshing Scotch and port wine nightcap, or perhaps a citrusy whisky aperitif. The Scotch and orange combo puts this drink in the same camp as the classic Blood & Sand.
Nutrition: One serving of Rosemary Tuck contains 204 calories
